start.content: Welcome to the Game. Press Next to start the game.

intro.content: In a deep dark forest, where the Sun never touches lives an old woman of immense power. She is called Baba Yaga, and all who meet here fear and despair. She lives in an ancient hut, with one striking feature. Instead of reaching the ground, the hut has horrible, large chicken legs and chicken wings. On the edge of the village is a small town, and you live in this town!

die.content: You have died. Press Restart Game to restart.
